# [Interview #1153: Calamity-Chicago, Entry #17](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1153#17)

#### Question

In the religion with Trell and Nalt, is that in any relation to Nalthis?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO.
